German[edit]

German Wikipedia has an article on:
Vorname
Wikipedia de

Etymology[edit]

vor- +‎ Name

Pronunciation[edit]

  • Audio (Austria)
    		(file)
  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Vorname m (genitive Vornamens, plural Vornamen)

  1. given name (name chosen for a child by its parents)
